text: Heber Hugo Carámbula, (31 October 1945 - 14 November 2015), also known under the stage name of Berugo Carámbula, was a Uruguayan actor, comedian and TV host. He was born in Las Piedras in 1945. He was known for his role in the Argentine telenovela Son Amores from which he starred in from 2002 through 2003. Carámbula died in Montevideo, Uruguay from complications of Parkinson's disease at the age of 70. ==references== ==Other websites== *Berugo Carámbula en cinenacional (Spanish) *Berugo Carámbula (Spanish) *Un único: Berugo Carámbula recordado en Buenos Aires (Spanish) Category:1945 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Uruguayan actors Category:Movie actors Category:Television actors Category:Comedians
title: Berugo Carámbula
